title: Various Artists - Tokyo Tribe Soundtrack [2014] [Soundtrack]
description:
Tracklist 
01. Hope -Tokyo Tribe Anthem- (4:02)
02. Ode to Tokyo Tribe (2:53)
03. Rising Tribes (Part 1) (2:44)
04. Musashino State of Mind (2:15)
05. Rising Tribes (Part 2) (2:53)
06. Big City of Dreams (1:51)
07. The Notorious Bubba (1:47)
08. Red Room Madness (1:52)
09. Lost in Saga (1:31)
10. Blaze of Fury (1:35)
11. South Island Musashino (0:57)
12. Deadly on Bukuro Street (1:31)
13. Here Comes the Killer (to Rock This Town) (1:47)
14. The Great Priest (1:31)
15. Code of the Waru (2:44)
16. Tribes Explosion (1:14)
17. Merra-N-Cholic (0:42)
18. Fight for Tokyo (4:13)
19. Ode to Tokyo Tribe (Interlude) (3:20)
20. Battle Park Tokyo (2:20)
21. If I Take the Crown (1:10)
22. Hope -Tokyo Tribe Anthem- (Tribes United ver.) (4:02)
23. Musashino State of Mind (Interlude) (2:15)
24. Bonds Don't Break (4:01)

Soundtrack to Sion Sono's gangstsa-sploitation rap musical film Tokyo Tribe, adapted from the manga TOKYOTRIBE2 by Inoue Santa. Yes, it sounds insane. Yes, it also works and is a great movie. 
The film (and soundtrack) feature several Japanese rappers
